price: (Ummanni isaas) ni jedhan: “Sila ati gooftolii keenya irraa akka gara nu galchituuf nutti dhuftee? waan nuun sodaachiftuun nutti koottu Yoo warra dhugaa dubbatan irraa taateef.”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā litafikanā ʿan ālihatinā fatinā bimā taʿidunā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
